main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Encanto, La Mesa, California on 13 June 1956. The object was described as oval-shaped, the size of a basketball, and incandescent in color. It was seen 60 degrees above the horizon and then faded out. The sighting was made near the San Diego destroyer base and was observed for 3-4 minutes.
interesting points: The object was oval-shaped, the size of a basketball, and had an incandescent color.
It was observed 60 degrees above the horizon before fading out.
The sighting occurred near the San Diego destroyer base.
The object circled or was nearby the area for 3-4 minutes before fading out.
The object was observed by 1st Lt. Robert L. Larowe, duty director of the 721st ACAW Squadron.
witnesses: 1st Lt. Robert L. Larowe, duty director of the 721st ACAW Squadron
